attributes.action: End this continuous pursuit of an easy target for taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This tax creeps up and up almost unnoticed.  I was not aware of the increase until it was pointed out by an article in "Horizons", the magazine for Newcastle International Airport

rejection.details: The petition detail does not make sense in relation to the petition title.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
